Package com.collaboportal.common.spring.oauth2

Class OAuth2CoreAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
com.collaboportal.common.spring.oauth2.OAuth2CoreAutoConfiguration
@AutoConfiguration @ComponentScan(basePackages={"com.collaboportal.common.oauth2.factory","com.collaboportal.common.oauth2.processor","com.collaboportal.common.oauth2.utils"}) public class OAuth2CoreAutoConfiguration extends Object
OAuth2 核心自動配置類 負責註冊 OAuth2 相關的核心組件
